query:
-- Get current user ID
SELECT id, name FROM user LIMIT 1;

-- Insert test scheduled posts for calendar
INSERT INTO post (userId, platform, tone, rawInput, generatedContent, scheduledFor, status, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM user LIMIT 1),
  'linkedin',
  'professional',
  'Test post for calendar',
  'This is a test LinkedIn post scheduled for tomorrow',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),
  'scheduled',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM user LIMIT 1),
  'twitter',
  'casual',
  'Test tweet',
  'This is a test Twitter post scheduled for 3 days from now',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY),
  'scheduled',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM user LIMIT 1),
  'instagram',
  'friendly',
  'Test Instagram post',
  'This is a test Instagram post scheduled for next week',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY),
  'scheduled',
  NOW(),
  NOW();
